answerText: selection rules [or transition rules; do not prompt on partial answers][10] Selection rules have been derived for electronic, rotational and this type of transition. In a certain spectroscopy, molecules that undergo this type of transition are only observable if the dipole changes.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 7 | 3 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: One of these constructs named for Laporte states that electronic transformations that conserve parity are forbidden. For 10 points each: [10] Identify these constructs that constrain the possible changes in energy state a given molecule can undergo.
